title: Con Living
description: In space, nobody can tell the aliens from the cosplayers.Science fiction meets the future as Flower, the sentient Dollnick colony ship working under contract for EarthCent, decides to host a con to bolster her anime business. But where can an alien artificial intelligence turn for the expertise to run a SciFi convention, and how can she manipulate everyone to bring about the desired results?Con Living is the third book in the EarthCent Universe series.
author: E.M. Foner
